entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Bonavista
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:24 PM NST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bonavista 10:30 PM NST Saturday 14 January 2023
Temperature: 3.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 3.7°C
Wind: S 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Rain. Risk of freezing rain early this evening. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm except 20 mm in areas of heaviest rain. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast late this evening and overnight. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Rain at times heavy or freezing rain. Temperature falling to zero in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy changing to freezing rain or rain late in the afternoon. Rainfall amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 30 gusting to 50 near noon. Temperature falling to zero in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Freezing rain mixed with rain. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or rain. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 14 January 2023
